name: Soap Christmas Ornaments
description:
If Santa uses soap on a rope, it looks something like this.
Bathropolitan helps you make your holiday decor as fashionable as possible with these chic Soap Christmas Balls. Give as a holiday gift, or as a christmas party favor, to truly get your friends into the holiday spirit. Each soap ball is hand rolled into the actual size of a tradition Christmas ball. A Bathropolitan artist then hand jewels each ball with sea salt crystals and sugar crystals, and fashions on the twine and ribbon bow. 


$10.00 each or 3 for $25.00
Each Soap Christmas Ball comes with a custom gift tag and is packaged in and organza bag.
Ornaments are available in tinted white, tinted rose, tinted sage colors.

name: Bachelorette Schlong Soaps
description:
IT’S HER LAST NIGHT OUT AS A SINGLE LADY, OR MAYBE A HUGE GAY PRIDE CELEBRATION,
EITHER WAY THIS WILL BE THE DIRTIEST SOAP YOU’LL EVER USE.
MAKE A SEXY SPLASH AT YOUR NEXT PARTY WITH THIS PHALLIC FAVORITE.

CUSTOM NAME AND DATE TAGS INCLUDED FOR BACHELORETTE PARTIES.
EACH SOAP PENIS IS MADE CAREFULLY AND PACKAGED IN AN ORGANZA BAG.
PENIS SOAPS AVAILABLE IN ANGLO/ASIAN, LATINO/MEDITERRANEAN, AND AFRICAN.

name: Soap Rosary
description:
SOAP ROSARIES WOULD BE MAKE A MEMORABLE PARTY FAVOR OR GIFT FOR YOUR BABY’S CHRISTENING, A CHURCH GATHERING, OR HOLY HOLIDAYS.

THESE BATHROPOLITAN BEADS WERE
INSPIRED BY YOU KNOW WHO.

HAND CUT ORGANIC SOAP BEADS ARE 17 " LONG, TIED TOGETHER WITH NATURAL TWINE.
CUSTOM GIFT TAGS AVAILABLE FOR PARTIES, CUSTOM COLORS AVAILABLE.WHOLESALE PRICES AVAILABLE FOR ORDERS OVER 50.

name: Flip Flop Soaps
description:
SUMMER LOVE BY THE OCEAN AND SEASIDE STYLE SHOULD BOTH BE PRESENT AT YOUR BEACH WEDDING OR SUMMER BASH.
THESE HAND MADE SANDAL SOAPS WILL BRIGHTEN UP SUNKISSED SKIN WITH THEIR EXFOLIATING LOOFA SHOE THAT SEPERATES FROM EACH FOOT EASILY.
EACH SANDAL SOAP IS 3.5",ONE SANDAL SOAP PER ORDER.
CUSTOM NAME AND DATE TAGS INCLUDED.
